title: NFL ATL: AFC preview & Browns QB decision
itunes:title: NFL ATL: AFC preview & Browns QB decision
description:
A room full of heroes (sort of) -- Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Dan Hanzus -- react to the Cleveland Browns officially naming Brian Hoyer starting quarterback and what it means for Wesseling's softball pants. The guys also give a full preview of the AFC and eliminate teams from "Team of ATL" contention.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
